description: A sizzling fried rice dish with peppered flavours and crunchy textures.
name: Szechuan Fried Rice with Halloumi & Carrot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g halloumi, cut into bit size cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the sesame oil.
Fry the halloumi pieces for 8 minutes while turning and remove from the pan once they start to brown.
Add the mushrooms, carrot and garlic to the pan and fry everything while tossing for 6 minutes.
Cook the rice as per packet instructions and then drain and set to one side.
Add the beaten eggs to the pan with the veg and cook while constantly breaking up for 5 minutes.
Add the halloumi, rice, vinegar, soy and Szechuan sauce to the pan and cook while tossing for 10 minutes.
Remove the fried rice from the heat and serve with scallions to garnish.
